physicalSystems

Class GPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • physicalSystems.GPS

  • public class GPS
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Eric Le Fort, Christopher McDonald

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GPS()
      Creates a new GPS with its latitude, longitude, altitude and ground level set to an initial value of 0.
      GPS(double altitude, double groundLevel)
      Creates a new GPS with its latitude and longitude set to an initial value of 0 and its altitude and groundLevel set to whatever is passed in.
      GPS(double lat, double lon, double altitude, double groundLevel)
      Creates a new GPS with all of its fields initialized to the corresponding values passed in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAltitude()
      Returns the current altitude.
      double getGroundLevel()
      Returns the altitude of ground level.
      double getLat()
      Returns the current latitude value represented through a cartesian coordinate system.
      double getLon()
      Returns the current longitude value represented through a cartesian coordinate system.
      void updateAltitude(double pitch, double currentSpeed, double minClimbSpeed, double timePassed)
      Takes the current altitude and alters it according to the states passed in over the given interval.
      void updateLocation(double direction, double currentSpeed, double timePassed)
      Takes the current latitude and longitude and alters them according to the states passed in over the given interval.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • updateLocation

        public void updateLocation(double direction,
                           double currentSpeed,
                           double timePassed)
        Takes the current latitude and longitude and alters them according to the states passed in over the given interval.
        Parameters:
        direction - - degrees, 0 - 360, not inclusive on the 360 degree end.
        currentSpeed - - km/h, positive
        timePassed - - seconds, the time passed since the last update.

      • updateAltitude

        public void updateAltitude(double pitch,
                           double currentSpeed,
                           double minClimbSpeed,
                           double timePassed)
        Takes the current altitude and alters it according to the states passed in over the given interval.
        Parameters:
        pitch - -
        currentSpeed - - km/h, positive
        minClimbSpeed- - km/h,
        timePassed - - seconds, the time passed since the last update.

      • getLat

        public double getLat()
        Returns the current latitude value represented through a cartesian coordinate system.
        Returns:
        The current latitude.

      • getLon

        public double getLon()
        Returns the current longitude value represented through a cartesian coordinate system.
        Returns:
        The current longitude.

      • getAltitude

        public double getAltitude()
        Returns the current altitude. Assumes the altitude is measured from sea level and can therefore be negative.
        Returns:
        The current altitude.

      • getGroundLevel

        public double getGroundLevel()
        Returns the altitude of ground level. Assumes the altitude is measured from sea level and can therefore be negative.
        Returns:
        The current altitude.
